task.title: Creating a PSC project
task.shortdesc: The tc-cli makes it quick and easy to create a new PSC project. By using the CLI, you can create a runnable PSC project by running just one command.

taskbody.prereq: To bootstrap a PSC project using the tc-cli, you need to have the CLI installed and the tc-cli command in your your path.

step.info: If you don't specify the project-name, you'll get asked for it in a next step.

taskbody.result: A folder matching the project-name gets created and a PSC project created in it. You can now begin developing your PSC.
